title: ASTM Standards Request: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Northwestern University LibrariesÂ will purchase ASTM standards for faculty and students upon request when the standard is used as part of current Northwestern course of study and research. Requestors must be affiliated with an academic department on the Evanston campus. Northwestern email address is required. In some cases, research consultation may be required. Submission of a request does not guarantee delivery of a standard and is subject to funding availability. ASTM standard request is limited to one standard per week per faculty or per student group.
